exceptions.reason: Avatar uses flex for centering initials inside a circular container. This is intrinsic to the Avatar component's purpose (showing centered text in a circle). Similar to Button's inline-flex pattern.
exceptions.decision: Accepted pattern - atom recipes can have flex for content centering

exceptions.reason: NavItem has intrinsic flex layout for icon+text pattern. Similar to how Button uses inline-flex items-center, NavItem requires flex items-center for its icon+label composition. justify-center is used in collapsed state.
exceptions.decision: Accepted pattern - molecule recipes can have simple flex layout for icon+text compositions
